definition: to have no need to fend for oneself (idiom)/to lead a pampered life
pinyin: shi2 zhi3 bu4 zhan1 yang2 chun1 shui3

definition: finger/to point at or to/to indicate or refer to/to depend on/to count on/(of hair) to stand on end
to moisten/to be infected by/to receive benefit or advantage through a contact/to touch
water/river/liquid/beverage/additional charges or income/(of clothes) classifier for number of washes
